name: Lisa Total investigation!
description:
Meet Paul and his fiancée, Lisa! They have exciting plans for the big day, but things take a turn for the worst. First, there is a suspicious accident in which one of their friends is killed. Then, a Scotland Yard officer recruits Paul as an undercover agent… They become involved in an investigation that will change their relationship forever. I guess many things can go wrong on the road to marriage!

What is certain is that their lives will never be the same...



In this virtual novel, you play the role of the future groom. You will have multiple choices that have impacts on your relation.
Knowing your fiancée decided to go off the pill to show her pregnancy to everyone at the wedding, will you still share your girlfriend with your best friend and/or try to keep her away from your perverted customer? This is your choice!



Lisa will also encounter strange fetishes like pet play and forniphilia (objectifying people).
How deep will the rabbit hole go…
Their wedding ceremony will surely be unlike any other before!

At the moment :


  • there are about 6 hours of content and lots of H scene!
  • more than 78,000 words
  • 2,321 static renders
  • 70 smoothed animations
  • 54 music
